text: János Dunai (26 June 1937 – 13 February 2025) was a Hungarian footballer. He played for the Hungary national football team in 1960. He won a bronze medal at the 1960 Summer Olympics at Rome, Italy. Dunai died on 13 February 2025 at the age of 87.Gyász: 87 évesen elhunyt az olimpiai bronzérmes Dunai János ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2025 deaths Category:Hungarian footballers Category:Olympic bronze medalists for Hungary
title: János Dunai
